titleStmt.title: Arthur Schnitzler: »Das Zeitlose ist von kürzester Dauer.« Interviews, Meinungen, Proteste

publisher.orgName: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities, Austrian Academy of Sciences

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) License applies to this text.
The CC BY 4.0 License also applies to this TEI XML file.

sourceDesc.p: All publications during Schnitzler’s lifetime including re-prints of texts have been included
